metadata.name: Potential Data Exfiltration Via Audio File
metadata.comment: Detects potential exfiltration attempt via audio file using PowerShell

batch.sql: SELECT * FROM script_activity WHERE time BETWEEN CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() - INTERVAL 24 HOUR AND CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() AND (lower(activity_id) = lower('1') AND contains(lower(script.script_content.value), lower('[system.math]::')) AND contains(lower(script.script_content.value), lower('[io.filemode]::')) AND contains(lower(script.script_content.value), lower('binarywriter')) AND contains(lower(script.script_content.value), lower('0x52')) AND contains(lower(script.script_content.value), lower('0x49')) AND contains(lower(script.script_content.value), lower('0x46')) AND contains(lower(script.script_content.value), lower('0x57')) AND contains(lower(script.script_content.value), lower('0x41')) AND contains(lower(script.script_content.value), lower('0x56')) AND contains(lower(script.script_content.value), lower('0x45')) AND contains(lower(script.script_content.value), lower('0xac')))

output.summary: Detects potential exfiltration attempt via audio file using PowerShell
